divs: sighting detailsmy wif and myself were walking down the drive way towards the hotel hanibal palace in port el kantoui sousse tunisia when i noticed a long object 4 - 6 feet long just slightly higher than the hotel moving towards me at roughly 50mph with a row if not consistant light running the full length of the object, the light \ lights were very dim and as the object got vurtualy overhead the lights went out. the object made no sound at all it was very silent and moved fairly quickly. i noticed the object first and said nothing to my wife whilst i studied what i was seeing, she then in a split secong asked me if i could "see that object in the sky" i told her i was already looking at it. we then followed the object visualy go over our heads and then dissapear into the night. the object we saw didnt appear to be a man made craft. the object i would say was roughly 1 foot in diameter or there abouts. after the encounter we discussed what we both saw and our descriptions and events were the same.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sousse
This sighting has never been favorited.
